## `SetMinimumDownloadFileSizeInKilobytes`

Sets the minimum size\index{web harvester!settings} a file must be to download.

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
SetMinimumDownloadFileSizeInKilobytes(number fileSize)
```

### Parameters {-}

**Parameter** | **Description**
| :-- | :-- |
| `number` fileSize | The number of kilobytes that a file must be to be downloaded. |
:::
